channel.title: My son, my executioner
channel.description:
My son, my executioner I take you in my arms Quiet and small and just astir and whom my body warms
Sweet death, small son, our instrument of immortality, your cries and hunger document our bodily decay.
We twenty two and twenty five, who seemed to live forever, observe enduring life in you and start to die together.
-Donald Hall
Impressions?

item.title: My son, my executioner
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
